item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 5/6/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed an issue where user status could be changed before joining a workspace. Resolved layout issues caused by dropdown menus in popups. Streamlined the signup and login process. Clicking the “Plan” label in the sidebar now redirects to the Billing page. Fixed a bug in the Billing page where users couldnâ€™t proceed in the Edit Plan popup when opened directly. Updated “Account” menu links to redirect to the workspace and language settings.
